tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE art_museums (
  museum_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  museum_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  established_year INT,
  total_artworks INT
)

CREATE TABLE artworks (
    artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    artist_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    year_created INT,
    museum_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (museum_id) REFERENCES museums (museum_id)
);

CREATE TABLE art_pieces (
  piece_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  piece_name VARCHAR(255),
  artist_name VARCHAR(255),
  year_created INT,
  museum_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (museum_id) REFERENCES art_museums(museum_id)
);

CREATE TABLE visitors (
  visitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  visitor_name VARCHAR(255),
  museum_id INT,
  visit_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (museum_id) REFERENCES art_museums(museum_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ArtWorks (
    work_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    work_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    artist_id INT NOT NULL,
    collection_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (artist_id) REFERENCES ArtArtists(artist_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (collection_id) REFERENCES ArtCollections(collection_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Artwork(
  artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  artist_id INT,
  creation_year INT,
  medium VARCHAR(50)
);
